fomod.Name: Black Market Mags Redux 1.0.3
fomod.Author: nox
fomod.Description:
This mod integrates Mags Redux into Black Market for Anomaly G.A.M.M.A.
DISCLAIMER : You need at least Black Market v2.6.h11 and Mags Redux
https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/armr-arti-and-ravenascendants-mags-redux/
Credits : The Mags Redux team, SalamanderAnder, Mr0Buggy and every goddamn dude that made this possible.
